name: ply1sclf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: asclf(c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cid, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: asclf(c1, c2, c3, c4, (= ` c0), c0 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wf(c1, c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cascl, c4))
-| wceq(cfv(cid, c0), cfv(csca, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c4, crg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c4, clmod))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cid, c0)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring →(c1 : c2 → c3))
⊣ c1 =(algSc ` c4)
⊣ (= ` c0)=(Scalar ` c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c4 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c4 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c2 =(Base `(= ` c0))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wf(c1, c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cascl, c4))
-| wceq(cfv(cid, c0), cfv(csca, c4))

-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c4, clmod))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cid, c0)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))

⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring →(c1 : c2 → c3))
⊣ c1 =(algSc ` c4)
⊣ (= ` c0)=(Scalar ` c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c4 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c4 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c2 =(Base `(= ` c0))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cid, c0), cfv(csca, c4))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c0))
